start.text: Sample Story\n\nYou wake up in a dark corridor lit by a single flickering panel.

left.text: A cold draft rolls out. A maintenance tunnel stretches into the distance.

right.text: The stairs creak. Above, you hear something moving… then silence.

deep.text: You find a sealed crate stamped VERSECRAFT. Inside is a note: “Phase 3C confirmed.”

top.text: At the landing, moonlight spills in through a broken skylight. Freedom is close.
